com.upsight.android.marketing

Class UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.marketing.UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters
  • Enclosing class:
    UpsightBillboard

    public static class UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Parameters for attaching marketing content to an UpsightBillboard.

      Creates an UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters instance for attaching marketing content to an UpsightBillboard.

        Creates an UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters instance for attaching marketing content to an UpsightBillboard.

      • putPreferredPresentationStyle

        public UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters putPreferredPresentationStyle(UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle presentationStyle)
        Optionally specifies a preferred UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle for displaying the marketing content. This will override the server-specified presentation style.
        Parameters:
        presentationStyle - The preferred UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle of the marketing content.
        Returns:
        This UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters instance.

      • getPreferredPresentationStyle

        public UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle getPreferredPresentationStyle()
        Gets the preferred UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle of the marketing content.
        Returns:
        The preferred UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle; or null if not provided.

      • putDialogTheme

        public UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters putDialogTheme(int dialogTheme)
        Optionally specifies a dialog theme for displaying any AlertDialog associated with the marketing content.
        Parameters:
        dialogTheme - The AlertDialog theme.
        Returns:
        This UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters instance.
